title: Microsoft Edge gets more Windows 11 UI elements for Insiders
content:
Microsoft is working on some additional UI enhancements for its Edge browser on Windows 11, bringing it more in line with the rest of the OS. If you’re running the Edge Canary channel on your Windows 11 PC right now, you have the option to use the translucent Mica material as well as rounded tabs.

The post Microsoft Edge gets more Windows 11 UI elements for Insiders appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is testing some further UI changes to its Edge browser to bring it closer to Windows 11 standards, including the new Mica material.
